channel.title: Fast AI on Sparkle Russell-Puleri

item.title: About
item.description: My journey from Chemical Engineering to Data Science! I am a rouge Chemical/Biomedical Engineer turned Data Scientist. I obtained my BS and MS in Chemical Engineering at New York University and my PhD. in Biomedical Engineering at The City College of New York. My thesis research focused on identifying cellular and molecular targets that can be utilized for the development of tools to prevent, diagnose, and treat heart related diseases such as arteriosclerosis.
